thread.title: Parks and Rec’s Youth Indoor Soccer registration due Nov. 18
thread.title_full: Parks and Rec’s Youth Indoor Soccer registration due Nov. 18

title: Parks and Rec’s Youth Indoor Soccer registration due Nov. 18
text: Walla Walla Parks and Recreation is taking registration for its youth indoor soccer league. The program is open to boys and girls in grades kindergarten through eighth grade. Players will be assigned to teams according to their grade and school they attend. Play will be 5-on-5 and begins with practices on Jan. 9. Practices will be one day per week and games will be Saturdays, at local school gyms. Practice times and days are determined by each coach. All participants receive a program T-shirt. Players will be required to wear shin guards and non-marking soft sole tennis shoes. Teams will be coached by volunteer coaches, contact the Parks and Recreation office at 527-4527 if interested. Cost is $50 per youth, and registration must be received by Nov. 18. Late registrations are subject to availability and a $10 late fee. Participants may register online at www.wwpr.us. For more information call the Parks and Recreation at 527-4527. More like this story
